channel.title: Women’s Wellness Podcast, Pandia Health
channel.itunes:author: Pandia Health
channel.itunes:summary: Pandia Health is on a mission to educate women on birth control, STI, and emergency contraceptives. In this podcast we’ll cover women's health in an open and frank educational format.
channel.description: Pandia Health is on a mission to educate women on birth control, STI, and emergency contraceptives. In this podcast we’ll cover women's health in an open and frank educational format.

item.title: Benefits of Skipping Your Periods
item.itunes:author: Pandia Health
item.itunes:subtitle: Benefits of Skipping Your Periods
item.itunes:summary:
By having fewer periods, you decrease your risk of endometrial and ovarian cancer, decrease blood loss (which can lead to lower academic performance if you become iron deficient), decrease your risk of anemia, and use fewer feminine hygiene products (decreasing the landfill in this world).
Visit to learn more: https://www.pandiahealth.com/blog/2016/08/22/did-you-know-that-you-can-skip-your-periods
item.content:encoded: Pandia Health is the only women-founded and led company in the birth control space. If you want to #skipthetrip to the pharmacy each month, sign up for our free delivery and automatic refill service now. Go to pandiahealth.com/pod and enter the code ‘podcast’ to get $5 off your telemedicine visit if needed. Or click on the link in the episode notes.

item.title: Did You Know That You Can Skip Your Periods?
item.itunes:author: Pandia Health
item.itunes:subtitle: Did You Know That You Can Skip Your Periods?
item.itunes:summary:
Did you know that you can skip your periods? Learn how to do it using the birth control pill or birth control ring and why it’s unnatural to have as many periods as we do.
Visit to learn more: https://www.pandiahealth.com/blog/2016/08/22/did-you-know-that-you-can-skip-your-periods
item.content:encoded: Pandia Health is the only women-founded and led company in the birth control space. item.title: Sexual Assault Awareness Month
item.itunes:author: Pandia Health
item.itunes:subtitle: Sexual Assault Awareness Month
item.itunes:summary:
April was Sexual Assault Awareness and Prevention Month (#SAAPM) and we wanted to share with you a few resources which highlight this issue.
Visit to learn more: https://www.pandiahealth.com/blog/2017/04/10/sexual-assault-awareness-month

item.title: 5 Things You Should Know About Birth Control
item.itunes:author: Pandia Health
item.itunes:subtitle: 5 Things You Should Know About Birth Control
item.itunes:summary:
This episode covers: Birth Control Does NOT make you fat. Birth control can be used to stop your period. Birth control will not make you infertile. Birth control pills may increase the risk of some cancers and decrease the risk of others. Birth control is not free but it should be available with no co-pay, no deductible if you have insurance. Birth control pills may increase the risk of some cancers and decrease the risk of others.
Visit to learn more: https://www.pandiahealth.com/blog/2016/07/26/5-things-you-should-know-about-birth-control
